hk.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

戴上手錶，時空驅動器啟動！
假面騎士變身音、投籃命中、功夫特效、惡搞聲音全收錄。支援 Apple Watch，一鍵發聲，讓你隨時隨地進入童年熱血世界！


回到童年快樂時光，成為你心中的超級英雄！

小時候的動畫片帶給我們無限的幻想和美好的夢想——變身為超人迪迦，拯救世界；化身為蒙面騎士，與怪獸激鬥；或者像悟空一樣，發射強大的龜派氣功！這些記憶，直到今天依然深深印在我們的心中。

這款手錶APP的靈感正是來自那些經典的童年動畫片。我們希望讓你重新體驗那種變身的激動與快感，模擬成為你心中的英雄，無論是超人、龍珠中的悟空，還是蝙蝠俠和蜘蛛俠！在危難時刻，你也能像童年英雄一樣，站出來拯救世界，消滅一切敵人！

你還記得童年時那份信念嗎？那份相信自己能變得強大的力量。現在，你可以通過這款APP再次感受到它——無論何時何地，只需輕輕一觸，變身就在眼前。

現在就下載HeroWatch 手錶變身器，重溫你的英雄夢！
hk.trackCensoredName: 手錶變身器：童年時光驅動器 - 100多種聲效

hk.description:
玩法简介
翻牌收集表情鸡：翻开卡牌，收集各种造型夸张、情绪爆棚的尖叫鸡表情包！
趣味合成升级：3只相同表情的尖叫鸡就能合成新等级，外形更可爱，尖叫声也更魔性！
技能卡反转战局：使用搞怪技能卡，比如“群体尖叫”“强制合成”“鸡飞狗跳”，让战局瞬间翻盘！

A simple cleanup management app that will quickly find your search!

Do you have trouble Looking for items?

Find your item quickly with "where I put it”!

Build a house, make furniture, assign lockers, and put all your belongings.

Books, important collections, hobby tools, children's toys, seasonal clothes, and items of recollections, the app will help you organize all things in the house.

hk.trackName: 石器狩獵勇士:原始人部落之戰
hk.description:
在這片古老而神秘的原始土地上，你扮演一位勇敢的原始戰士，肩負著保衛部落的重任。城牆之外，兇猛的恐龍和野獸隨時準備攻擊你。拿起你的武器，準備迎接一場驚心動魄的戰鬥吧！
遊戲玩法
遊戲操作簡單，所有玩家都能輕鬆上手。透過在螢幕上左右滑動，你可以控制你的原始戰士在城牆上移動，躲避野獸的攻擊。點擊螢幕，他的武器可以越過城牆射擊，攻擊逼近的敵人。每一次精準的射擊都可能改變戰局，所以要保持警惕，靈活機動，確保每一次攻擊都命中目標。
武器系統
在戰鬥中，擊敗野獸不僅可以降低威脅，還能讓你有機會收集它們掉落的武器。這些武器種類繁多，有些可以增加傷害，有些可以擴大射程，有些甚至帶有冰凍或燃燒等特殊效果。巧妙地使用這些武器，將讓你在戰鬥中佔上風。 Boss 戰與強力武器
成功擊敗一波又一波的野獸後，強大的 Boss 便會出現。這些 Boss 體型巨大，攻擊力驚人，擊敗它們後您將獲得強力武器作為獎勵。這些武器不僅威力強大，還可能擁有獨特的技能，使後續戰鬥更有效率。

生命值恢復與怪物屠殺

在戰鬥中，擊殺一定數量的怪物後，您的生命值將自動恢復。這意味著即使您在激烈的戰鬥中受到傷害，只要您堅持不懈，就能恢復並繼續保衛您的部落。

坐騎與恐龍夥伴

隨著遊戲的進行，您將解鎖坐騎和恐龍夥伴。坐騎可以提高您的移動速度，讓您更靈活地躲避攻擊。恐龍夥伴與您並肩作戰，擁有強大的攻擊力和特殊技能，讓您更輕鬆地擊敗敵人。

這是一款輕鬆的迷你遊戲，非常適合在閒暇時享受。無論你是通勤，還是短暫休息，都能快速沉浸在戰鬥的樂趣中。拿起你的武器，加入保衛原始部落的戰鬥，成為部落的英雄！
hk.trackCensoredName: 石器狩獵勇士:原始人部落之戰

為了將您的體驗提升到全新層次，我們帶來了三項令人驚艷的新功能：
• 強化版 VoiceOver：提供更清晰、詳盡的描述，讓視障使用者操作更方便。
• 智慧預測搜尋：即時建議，幫助您在數秒內找到想要的內容。

hk.description:
我們的應用實時連接到YouTube，讓您播放任何視頻，並擁有專為您設計的獨家功能！
主要功能亮點：
• 鎖屏播放：在後台持續收聽您視頻的音頻。
• 浮動播放（畫中畫）：在觀看視頻時使用其他應用。
• 睡眠定時器：設置自動關閉，安心放鬆。
• 循環模式：無限循環播放您喜歡的視頻。
此外還包括：
• 可切換字幕
• 播放速度控制
• 質量選擇和全屏模式
• 智能搜索，即時建議（預測搜索）
• 上傳日期篩選：按天、週、月或年
FyTube非常適合不想錯過任何喜歡主題視頻的用戶。
盡情探索、播放並享受您喜愛的內容——無干擾！

特別功能
浮動播放
永不停播！有了此功能，您可以在使用其他應用時繼續觀看視頻。
只需進入全屏模式，點擊畫中畫按鈕——它是播放器頂部的第二個圖標。
無論打開哪個應用，您的視頻都會浮動在螢幕頂部！

鎖屏播放
無中斷收聽！
即使螢幕關閉，也能繼續享受視頻音頻。非常適合開車或休息時聽音樂、播客或喜歡的曲目。
如何激活？
只需鎖定設備螢幕，即刻會看到後台播放器。
點擊播放——音頻將持續不斷。

睡眠定時器
安然入睡——應用會自動停止！
啟用此功能後，視頻將在您設定的時間後自動停止。非常適合睡覺或小憩，無需擔心忘記關閉。
如何激活？
點擊定時器按鈕，選擇運行時間，就完成了。
放鬆，剩下的交給應用！

循環模式
反覆播放您喜歡的視頻！
啟用此功能，視頻會自動重複播放任意次數。
怎麼知道它是否開啟？
啟動時圖標會變紅。
（支援VoiceOver：會提示開啟或關閉狀態。）
非常適合歌曲、冥想或任何您喜歡反覆播放的內容！

需要幫助使用這些功能？訪問：fydub.com/fytube

基本功能
• 全屏高清播放
• 簡單易用的介面，友好設計
• 隨時快進或倒退——不錯過精彩部分

• 支援任何兼容AirPlay的設備播放
• 支援VoiceOver（增強描述）
• 無需帳號
• 未經您允許，不儲存快取、Cookie或個人資料——安全觀看
• 介面支援29種語言
• 無廣告，無訂閱
購買FyTube一次付費，開啟無廣告無訂閱的新串流體驗。

最低要求：

配置城堡和小巷，建立出大氣的城下町吧！

增加代表商店和居民經濟價值的『俸祿』，爭取成為日本第一的大名吧。

建造客棧後，歷史上的名人也許會在『各國漫遊之旅』、『驅鬼之旅』、『寺子屋修學旅行』中前來參觀。

advisories: 偶爾/輕度使用或提及酒精、煙草或藥物
hk.releaseNotes: Fix for startup crash when Speak Screen accessibility option is enabled
hk.description:
你獨自一人在一座陌生的島嶼醒來，島上充滿各種令人意想不到的謎題，等你來挑戰。

你不記得自己是誰，也不記得是如何來到這裡，你唯一能做的就是探索這座島嶼，希望挖掘線索找回自己的記憶，想辦法找到回家的路。

The Witness 是一個單人遊戲，玩家在一個含有數十個地點的開放世界裡探索並克服 500 道以上的謎題。這個遊戲相當敬重玩家的聰明才智，並珍惜他們寶貴的時間。這裡沒有濫竽充數的謎題，每道謎題都結合新的概念在裡面。所以，這是一個充滿創意的遊戲。

hk.trackName: 電影精靈 - 專業視頻編輯和電影製作
hk.releaseNotes: 修复在iPhone X/12/13下，曲线变速页面显示不正常的问题。
hk.description:
您想製作屬於自己的微電影嗎？
您想當導演、製片、主演……嗎？

在電影精靈中，這些角色可以全部由您一個人搞定！

通過電影精靈，您可以把各種媒體素材如視頻、照片、音樂、文字、錄音以及手指塗鴉等，按照您的創意，把它們編輯組合在一起，並給它們添加各種特效（場景切換特效、文字動畫、濾鏡特效、片頭、蒙版等），創作出屬於您自己的微電影。

主要功能：

-可裁剪、分割、合併、縮放各種媒體素材
-疊加多層視頻（畫中畫效果），視頻數量沒有限制
-添加各種蒙版（線性蒙版、矩形蒙版、圓形蒙版、文字蒙版和路徑蒙版）來隱藏或者顯示影片的各個部分
-可摳圖（鋼筆工具、套索工具、塗抹工具和文字工具等自定義形狀摳圖工具）
-快進、倒播視頻，給視頻添加慢動作鏡頭（1/12慢速至16倍速）
- 360度旋轉影片
-多種混合影像模式
-各種字體、文字模版、文字顏色、表情符號、陰影、文字描邊等
-內寘多種風格的免費配樂和音效，可添加電腦上的音樂或者iTunes裏的音樂，還可選取匯出視頻裏的音訊
-給視頻配音錄音
-直接在影片上用手指繪畫塗鴉
-專業視頻比例，可縮放的時間線，無限制的軌道圖層
-簡單自動跟蹤功能
-添加移動式馬賽克
-自定義影片背景顏色
-可調整素材亮度、對比度、飽和度
-創建自己的Gif動畫
-私人定制特效片頭（需另外購買）
-多達幾十種濾鏡特效（素描、漫畫、魚眼、放大鏡、顏色濾鏡等）
-多達幾十種場景切換特效
-可給視頻／照片設定各種外觀如圓形、心形和鑽石等，甚至自定義獨一無二的形狀
-可設定疊加視頻／照片的透明色（Chroma Key），比如去除照片中純色背景色（綠幕藍幕摳像）
-能把視頻／照片變黑白，把需要突出的部分還原色彩突出出來（Color Splash）
-能自由變形視頻／照片成不規則形狀
-給視頻／照片／文字添加運動點，使它們動起來，縮放、旋轉和移動結合起來可創建出各種各樣的絢麗效果
-實时預覽，高分辨視頻輸出
-可通過Wi-Fi直接從電腦導入多媒體素材：視頻、照片、音樂和Gif動畫等
-可直接保存並分享影片到社交網絡，如雲盤、微信、QQ、抖音等

如果您有任何問題或迴響，請直接發郵件到verytools2006@gmail.com，我們會儘快答覆您。謝謝！

偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
hk.description:
召集傳說英雄，挑戰無盡關卡！
自動戰鬥、採礦、強化通通都有！
真正的放置型奇幻 RPG，即使離線也能持續成長！

* 組建擁有獨特技能的英雄戰隊，發揮戰略優勢！

* 利用礦坑系統收集資源！打造裝備所需的一切盡在其中！

* 多樣化內容：地城、遺物、進化、傳說裝備等你來體驗！

立即下載，開始書寫屬於你的傳奇！
馬上開始遊戲，收集你的英雄吧！
hk.releaseNotes: - The HP increase buff has been removed from PvP and Guild Battles.

hk.trackName: 石器狩獵勇士:原始人部落之戰
hk.description:
在這片古老而神秘的原始土地上，你扮演一位勇敢的原始戰士，肩負著保衛部落的重任。城牆之外，兇猛的恐龍和野獸隨時準備攻擊你。拿起你的武器，準備迎接一場驚心動魄的戰鬥吧！
遊戲玩法
遊戲操作簡單，所有玩家都能輕鬆上手。透過在螢幕上左右滑動，你可以控制你的原始戰士在城牆上移動，躲避野獸的攻擊。點擊螢幕，他的武器可以越過城牆射擊，攻擊逼近的敵人。每一次精準的射擊都可能改變戰局，所以要保持警惕，靈活機動，確保每一次攻擊都命中目標。
武器系統
在戰鬥中，擊敗野獸不僅可以降低威脅，還能讓你有機會收集它們掉落的武器。這些武器種類繁多，有些可以增加傷害，有些可以擴大射程，有些甚至帶有冰凍或燃燒等特殊效果。巧妙地使用這些武器，將讓你在戰鬥中佔上風。 Boss 戰與強力武器
成功擊敗一波又一波的野獸後，強大的 Boss 便會出現。這些 Boss 體型巨大，攻擊力驚人，擊敗它們後您將獲得強力武器作為獎勵。這些武器不僅威力強大，還可能擁有獨特的技能，使後續戰鬥更有效率。

生命值恢復與怪物屠殺

在戰鬥中，擊殺一定數量的怪物後，您的生命值將自動恢復。這意味著即使您在激烈的戰鬥中受到傷害，只要您堅持不懈，就能恢復並繼續保衛您的部落。

坐騎與恐龍夥伴

隨著遊戲的進行，您將解鎖坐騎和恐龍夥伴。坐騎可以提高您的移動速度，讓您更靈活地躲避攻擊。恐龍夥伴與您並肩作戰，擁有強大的攻擊力和特殊技能，讓您更輕鬆地擊敗敵人。

這是一款輕鬆的迷你遊戲，非常適合在閒暇時享受。無論你是通勤，還是短暫休息，都能快速沉浸在戰鬥的樂趣中。拿起你的武器，加入保衛原始部落的戰鬥，成為部落的英雄！

Corrections to Korean and Chinese Translations.

mo.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html

mo.description:
戴上手錶，時空驅動器啟動！
假面騎士變身音、投籃命中、功夫特效、惡搞聲音全收錄。支援 Apple Watch，一鍵發聲，讓你隨時隨地進入童年熱血世界！


回到童年快樂時光，成為你心中的超級英雄！

小時候的動畫片帶給我們無限的幻想和美好的夢想——變身為超人迪迦，拯救世界；化身為蒙面騎士，與怪獸激鬥；或者像悟空一樣，發射強大的龜派氣功！這些記憶，直到今天依然深深印在我們的心中。

這款手錶APP的靈感正是來自那些經典的童年動畫片。我們希望讓你重新體驗那種變身的激動與快感，模擬成為你心中的英雄，無論是超人、龍珠中的悟空，還是蝙蝠俠和蜘蛛俠！在危難時刻，你也能像童年英雄一樣，站出來拯救世界，消滅一切敵人！

你還記得童年時那份信念嗎？那份相信自己能變得強大的力量。現在，你可以通過這款APP再次感受到它——無論何時何地，只需輕輕一觸，變身就在眼前。

現在就下載HeroWatch 手錶變身器，重溫你的英雄夢！

• 睡眠定時器：設置自動關閉，安心放鬆。
• 循環模式：無限循環播放您喜歡的視頻。
此外還包括：
• 可切換字幕

FyTube非常適合不想錯過任何喜歡主題視頻的用戶。
盡情探索、播放並享受您喜愛的內容——無干擾！

特別功能
浮動播放
永不停播！有了此功能，您可以在使用其他應用時繼續觀看視頻。

mo.description:
你獨自一人在一座陌生的島嶼醒來，島上充滿各種令人意想不到的謎題，等你來挑戰。

你不記得自己是誰，也不記得是如何來到這裡，你唯一能做的就是探索這座島嶼，希望挖掘線索找回自己的記憶，想辦法找到回家的路。

The Witness 是一個單人遊戲，玩家在一個含有數十個地點的開放世界裡探索並克服 500 道以上的謎題。這個遊戲相當敬重玩家的聰明才智，並珍惜他們寶貴的時間。這裡沒有濫竽充數的謎題，每道謎題都結合新的概念在裡面。所以，這是一個充滿創意的遊戲。

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的粗俗用語或低俗幽默
偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
mo.description:
神祕的面紗籠罩著這片未知的中世紀大地，古老的紀念碑、遺跡和神話般的生物在此等待你的到來。往昔時代的回音訴說著過去的偉大，《Kingdom Two Crowns》是屢獲殊榮的《Kingdom》系列遊戲的一部分，你將化身君主，踏上冒險之旅。在這趟橫軸冒險旅程中，騎上坐騎，徵召忠誠的臣民，建設你的王國，同時還得保護王冠不被貪婪生物奪走——這些駭人的怪物滿心想著將王國的寶藏偷個一乾二淨。

建造
建造高聳的城牆和瞭望塔，為強大王國奠定基礎，同時建造農場、徵召村民，使王國欣欣向榮。在《Kingdom Two Crowns》中，你可以開疆闢土、增強國力，逐步獲得新的臣民兵將和技術。
  
探索
探索疆域以外的未知之地，穿過偏僻的森林和古老的廢墟，尋找寶藏和隱藏的知識，協助你一路冒險。誰知道你會發現什麼傳奇神器或神話生靈呢？

防禦
隨著夜幕降臨，暗影開始甦醒，駭人的貪婪生物也將襲擊你的王國。召集軍隊、鼓起勇氣、磨練自己，你必須不斷增長自身的戰術技巧，才有望夜復一夜地保住性命。部署弓箭手、騎士、攻城武器，甚至是新獲得的君主能力和神器，抵禦一波又一波襲來的貪婪生物。 

征服
你作為一國之君，需要親自率軍攻擊貪婪生物的源頭，才能保護轄下諸島。派遣麾下部隊挺身迎敵。注意：請確保你的軍隊兵精糧足，因為貪婪生物不會不戰而降。  

未知的島嶼
《Kingdom Two Crowns》帶給玩家不斷進化的遊戲體驗，包含幾項免費內容更新：

• 《Shogun》：造訪新國度，探索以日本封建時代的文化與建築為靈感的場景。成為強大的幕府將軍或女武士，謀取忍者支持、駕馭傳說中的麒麟來率領部隊作戰，並運籌帷幄，無畏面對躲在重重竹林內的敵人。

• 《Dead Lands》：深入王國的黑暗之地。化身成獨一無二、擁有強大特質的君主，例如哥德式恐怖動作RPG遊戲《血咒之城：暗夜儀式》的碎片人米利暗。

• 挑戰島：對於久經沙場的老練君主來說，這是有史以來最大的挑戰。迎接五項規則和目標各不相同的挑戰。你能活得夠久，奪得最終的金王冠嗎？

還可透過 App 內購取得新的 DLC：

• 《Norse Lands》：在這款維京主題的擴充內容裡仰仗北歐諸神的力量、指揮彪悍的軍隊，打造維京風格的兵械，並破解謎題吧。

• 《Call of Olympus》：進入以古希臘為背景的大型擴充內容，探索古老傳說中的島嶼，尋求眾神恩典，抵禦陣容空前的貪婪生物大軍。

你的冒險才剛剛開始。君主啊，請保持警戒，因為黑夜就要來臨，保護好你的王冠！
mo.releaseNotes:
奧林匹斯試煉：所有挑戰島現已新增「Call of Olympus」，供擁有該DLC的玩家選擇。
已修復一個罕見問題，該問題先前可能導致遊戲內時間停止（最常發生在瘟疫島）。
騎士與其部隊在王國城牆內防禦時，現在會正確轉向朝外。
挑戰島的載入畫面現已新增任務目標提醒。

mo.trackCensoredName: 電影精靈 - 專業視頻編輯和電影製作
mo.trackName: 電影精靈 - 專業視頻編輯和電影製作
mo.releaseNotes: 修复在iPhone X/12/13下，曲线变速页面显示不正常的问题。
mo.description:
您想製作屬於自己的微電影嗎？
您想當導演、製片、主演……嗎？

在電影精靈中，這些角色可以全部由您一個人搞定！

通過電影精靈，您可以把各種媒體素材如視頻、照片、音樂、文字、錄音以及手指塗鴉等，按照您的創意，把它們編輯組合在一起，並給它們添加各種特效（場景切換特效、文字動畫、濾鏡特效、片頭、蒙版等），創作出屬於您自己的微電影。

主要功能：

-可裁剪、分割、合併、縮放各種媒體素材
-疊加多層視頻（畫中畫效果），視頻數量沒有限制
-添加各種蒙版（線性蒙版、矩形蒙版、圓形蒙版、文字蒙版和路徑蒙版）來隱藏或者顯示影片的各個部分
-可摳圖（鋼筆工具、套索工具、塗抹工具和文字工具等自定義形狀摳圖工具）
-快進、倒播視頻，給視頻添加慢動作鏡頭（1/12慢速至16倍速）
- 360度旋轉影片
-多種混合影像模式
-各種字體、文字模版、文字顏色、表情符號、陰影、文字描邊等
-內寘多種風格的免費配樂和音效，可添加電腦上的音樂或者iTunes裏的音樂，還可選取匯出視頻裏的音訊
-給視頻配音錄音
-直接在影片上用手指繪畫塗鴉
-專業視頻比例，可縮放的時間線，無限制的軌道圖層
-簡單自動跟蹤功能
-添加移動式馬賽克
-自定義影片背景顏色
-可調整素材亮度、對比度、飽和度
-創建自己的Gif動畫
-私人定制特效片頭（需另外購買）
-多達幾十種濾鏡特效（素描、漫畫、魚眼、放大鏡、顏色濾鏡等）
-多達幾十種場景切換特效
-可給視頻／照片設定各種外觀如圓形、心形和鑽石等，甚至自定義獨一無二的形狀
-可設定疊加視頻／照片的透明色（Chroma Key），比如去除照片中純色背景色（綠幕藍幕摳像）
-能把視頻／照片變黑白，把需要突出的部分還原色彩突出出來（Color Splash）
-能自由變形視頻／照片成不規則形狀
-給視頻／照片／文字添加運動點，使它們動起來，縮放、旋轉和移動結合起來可創建出各種各樣的絢麗效果
-實时預覽，高分辨視頻輸出
-可通過Wi-Fi直接從電腦導入多媒體素材：視頻、照片、音樂和Gif動畫等
-可直接保存並分享影片到社交網絡，如雲盤、微信、QQ、抖音等

如果您有任何問題或迴響，請直接發郵件到verytools2006@gmail.com，我們會儘快答覆您。謝謝！

建造亮麗的江戶之城。
配置城堡和小巷，建立出大氣的城下町吧！

增加代表商店和居民經濟價值的『俸祿』，爭取成為日本第一的大名吧。

發展的秘訣在於將契合度好的建築物建在一起，例如『蕎麥麵店＋天婦羅店』、『地藏菩薩＋帽傘店』等。

建造客棧後，歷史上的名人也許會在『各國漫遊之旅』、『驅鬼之旅』、『寺子屋修學旅行』中前來參觀。

開闢江戶未來的也許就是正在瀏覽介紹的你！！
----
其它遊戲請透過關鍵字「Kairosoft」來進行搜索。https://kairopark.jp
還有支援移動設備/電腦的遊戲發展國物語等免費遊戲哦。

mo.description:
召集傳說英雄，挑戰無盡關卡！
自動戰鬥、採礦、強化通通都有！
真正的放置型奇幻 RPG，即使離線也能持續成長！

* 組建擁有獨特技能的英雄戰隊，發揮戰略優勢！

* 利用礦坑系統收集資源！打造裝備所需的一切盡在其中！

* 挑戰強大的首領，獲得傳說級獎勵！

* 自動成長系統，讓忙碌的你也能輕鬆遊玩！

* 多樣化內容：地城、遺物、進化、傳說裝備等你來體驗！

立即下載，開始書寫屬於你的傳奇！
馬上開始遊戲，收集你的英雄吧！

tw.description:
玩法简介
翻牌收集表情鸡：翻开卡牌，收集各种造型夸张、情绪爆棚的尖叫鸡表情包！
趣味合成升级：3只相同表情的尖叫鸡就能合成新等级，外形更可爱，尖叫声也更魔性！
技能卡反转战局：使用搞怪技能卡，比如“群体尖叫”“强制合成”“鸡飞狗跳”，让战局瞬间翻盘！

tw.trackName: 石器狩獵勇士:原始人部落之戰
tw.description:
在這片古老而神秘的原始土地上，你扮演一位勇敢的原始戰士，肩負著保衛部落的重任。城牆之外，兇猛的恐龍和野獸隨時準備攻擊你。拿起你的武器，準備迎接一場驚心動魄的戰鬥吧！
遊戲玩法
遊戲操作簡單，所有玩家都能輕鬆上手。透過在螢幕上左右滑動，你可以控制你的原始戰士在城牆上移動，躲避野獸的攻擊。點擊螢幕，他的武器可以越過城牆射擊，攻擊逼近的敵人。每一次精準的射擊都可能改變戰局，所以要保持警惕，靈活機動，確保每一次攻擊都命中目標。
武器系統
在戰鬥中，擊敗野獸不僅可以降低威脅，還能讓你有機會收集它們掉落的武器。這些武器種類繁多，有些可以增加傷害，有些可以擴大射程，有些甚至帶有冰凍或燃燒等特殊效果。巧妙地使用這些武器，將讓你在戰鬥中佔上風。 Boss 戰與強力武器
成功擊敗一波又一波的野獸後，強大的 Boss 便會出現。這些 Boss 體型巨大，攻擊力驚人，擊敗它們後您將獲得強力武器作為獎勵。這些武器不僅威力強大，還可能擁有獨特的技能，使後續戰鬥更有效率。

生命值恢復與怪物屠殺

在戰鬥中，擊殺一定數量的怪物後，您的生命值將自動恢復。這意味著即使您在激烈的戰鬥中受到傷害，只要您堅持不懈，就能恢復並繼續保衛您的部落。

坐騎與恐龍夥伴

隨著遊戲的進行，您將解鎖坐騎和恐龍夥伴。坐騎可以提高您的移動速度，讓您更靈活地躲避攻擊。恐龍夥伴與您並肩作戰，擁有強大的攻擊力和特殊技能，讓您更輕鬆地擊敗敵人。

這是一款輕鬆的迷你遊戲，非常適合在閒暇時享受。無論你是通勤，還是短暫休息，都能快速沉浸在戰鬥的樂趣中。拿起你的武器，加入保衛原始部落的戰鬥，成為部落的英雄！
tw.trackCensoredName: 石器狩獵勇士:原始人部落之戰

tw.releaseNotes:
Corrections to Korean and Chinese Translations.
Updates to SmartEye smart eyepiece control.
Stability and usability updates.
tw.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html

tw.trackCensoredName: 手錶變身器：童年時光驅動器 - 100多種聲效
tw.trackName: 手錶變身器：童年時光驅動器 - 100多種聲效
tw.releaseNotes: 新增兩個新音效：五條悟、Zeztz。
tw.description:
戴上手錶，時空驅動器啟動！
假面騎士變身音、投籃命中、功夫特效、惡搞聲音全收錄。支援 Apple Watch，一鍵發聲，讓你隨時隨地進入童年熱血世界！


回到童年快樂時光，成為你心中的超級英雄！

小時候的動畫片帶給我們無限的幻想和美好的夢想——變身為超人迪迦，拯救世界；化身為蒙面騎士，與怪獸激鬥；或者像悟空一樣，發射強大的龜派氣功！這些記憶，直到今天依然深深印在我們的心中。

這款手錶APP的靈感正是來自那些經典的童年動畫片。我們希望讓你重新體驗那種變身的激動與快感，模擬成為你心中的英雄，無論是超人、龍珠中的悟空，還是蝙蝠俠和蜘蛛俠！在危難時刻，你也能像童年英雄一樣，站出來拯救世界，消滅一切敵人！

你還記得童年時那份信念嗎？那份相信自己能變得強大的力量。現在，你可以通過這款APP再次感受到它——無論何時何地，只需輕輕一觸，變身就在眼前。

現在就下載HeroWatch 手錶變身器，重溫你的英雄夢！

玩法简介
翻牌收集表情鸡：翻开卡牌，收集各种造型夸张、情绪爆棚的尖叫鸡表情包！
趣味合成升级：3只相同表情的尖叫鸡就能合成新等级，外形更可爱，尖叫声也更魔性！
技能卡反转战局：使用搞怪技能卡，比如“群体尖叫”“强制合成”“鸡飞狗跳”，让战局瞬间翻盘！

A simple cleanup management app that will quickly find your search!

Do you have trouble Looking for items?

Find your item quickly with "where I put it”!

Build a house, make furniture, assign lockers, and put all your belongings.

Books, important collections, hobby tools, children's toys, seasonal clothes, and items of recollections, the app will help you organize all things in the house.

tw.releaseNotes:
為了將您的體驗提升到全新層次，我們帶來了三項令人驚艷的新功能：
• 強化版 VoiceOver：提供更清晰、詳盡的描述，讓視障使用者操作更方便。
• 智慧預測搜尋：即時建議，幫助您在數秒內找到想要的內容。
• 新增睡眠計時器：可自動停止播放，讓您在休息或入睡時更安心。
tw.description:
我們的應用實時連接到YouTube，讓您播放任何視頻，並擁有專為您設計的獨家功能！
主要功能亮點：
• 鎖屏播放：在後台持續收聽您視頻的音頻。
• 浮動播放（畫中畫）：在觀看視頻時使用其他應用。
• 睡眠定時器：設置自動關閉，安心放鬆。
• 循環模式：無限循環播放您喜歡的視頻。
此外還包括：
• 可切換字幕
• 播放速度控制
• 質量選擇和全屏模式
• 智能搜索，即時建議（預測搜索）
• 上傳日期篩選：按天、週、月或年
FyTube非常適合不想錯過任何喜歡主題視頻的用戶。
盡情探索、播放並享受您喜愛的內容——無干擾！

特別功能
浮動播放
永不停播！有了此功能，您可以在使用其他應用時繼續觀看視頻。
只需進入全屏模式，點擊畫中畫按鈕——它是播放器頂部的第二個圖標。
無論打開哪個應用，您的視頻都會浮動在螢幕頂部！

鎖屏播放
無中斷收聽！
即使螢幕關閉，也能繼續享受視頻音頻。非常適合開車或休息時聽音樂、播客或喜歡的曲目。
如何激活？
只需鎖定設備螢幕，即刻會看到後台播放器。
點擊播放——音頻將持續不斷。

睡眠定時器
安然入睡——應用會自動停止！
啟用此功能後，視頻將在您設定的時間後自動停止。非常適合睡覺或小憩，無需擔心忘記關閉。
如何激活？
點擊定時器按鈕，選擇運行時間，就完成了。
放鬆，剩下的交給應用！

循環模式
反覆播放您喜歡的視頻！
啟用此功能，視頻會自動重複播放任意次數。
怎麼知道它是否開啟？
啟動時圖標會變紅。
（支援VoiceOver：會提示開啟或關閉狀態。）
非常適合歌曲、冥想或任何您喜歡反覆播放的內容！

需要幫助使用這些功能？訪問：fydub.com/fytube

基本功能

tw.releaseNotes: Fix for startup crash when Speak Screen accessibility option is enabled
tw.description:
你獨自一人在一座陌生的島嶼醒來，島上充滿各種令人意想不到的謎題，等你來挑戰。

你不記得自己是誰，也不記得是如何來到這裡，你唯一能做的就是探索這座島嶼，希望挖掘線索找回自己的記憶，想辦法找到回家的路。

The Witness 是一個單人遊戲，玩家在一個含有數十個地點的開放世界裡探索並克服 500 道以上的謎題。這個遊戲相當敬重玩家的聰明才智，並珍惜他們寶貴的時間。這裡沒有濫竽充數的謎題，每道謎題都結合新的概念在裡面。所以，這是一個充滿創意的遊戲。

advisories: 偶而/輕微的粗話或低俗幽默
偶而/輕微的卡通或幻想暴力
tw.releaseNotes:
奧林匹斯試煉：所有挑戰島現已新增「Call of Olympus」，供擁有該DLC的玩家選擇。
已修復一個罕見問題，該問題先前可能導致遊戲內時間停止（最常發生在瘟疫島）。
騎士與其部隊在王國城牆內防禦時，現在會正確轉向朝外。
挑戰島的載入畫面現已新增任務目標提醒。
已修復其他小問題。
tw.description:
神祕的面紗籠罩著這片未知的中世紀大地，古老的紀念碑、遺跡和神話般的生物在此等待你的到來。往昔時代的回音訴說著過去的偉大，《Kingdom Two Crowns》是屢獲殊榮的《Kingdom》系列遊戲的一部分，你將化身君主，踏上冒險之旅。在這趟橫軸冒險旅程中，騎上坐騎，徵召忠誠的臣民，建設你的王國，同時還得保護王冠不被貪婪生物奪走——這些駭人的怪物滿心想著將王國的寶藏偷個一乾二淨。

建造
建造高聳的城牆和瞭望塔，為強大王國奠定基礎，同時建造農場、徵召村民，使王國欣欣向榮。在《Kingdom Two Crowns》中，你可以開疆闢土、增強國力，逐步獲得新的臣民兵將和技術。
  
探索
探索疆域以外的未知之地，穿過偏僻的森林和古老的廢墟，尋找寶藏和隱藏的知識，協助你一路冒險。誰知道你會發現什麼傳奇神器或神話生靈呢？

防禦
隨著夜幕降臨，暗影開始甦醒，駭人的貪婪生物也將襲擊你的王國。召集軍隊、鼓起勇氣、磨練自己，你必須不斷增長自身的戰術技巧，才有望夜復一夜地保住性命。部署弓箭手、騎士、攻城武器，甚至是新獲得的君主能力和神器，抵禦一波又一波襲來的貪婪生物。 

征服
你作為一國之君，需要親自率軍攻擊貪婪生物的源頭，才能保護轄下諸島。派遣麾下部隊挺身迎敵。注意：請確保你的軍隊兵精糧足，因為貪婪生物不會不戰而降。  

未知的島嶼
《Kingdom Two Crowns》帶給玩家不斷進化的遊戲體驗，包含幾項免費內容更新：

• 《Shogun》：造訪新國度，探索以日本封建時代的文化與建築為靈感的場景。成為強大的幕府將軍或女武士，謀取忍者支持、駕馭傳說中的麒麟來率領部隊作戰，並運籌帷幄，無畏面對躲在重重竹林內的敵人。

• 《Dead Lands》：深入王國的黑暗之地。化身成獨一無二、擁有強大特質的君主，例如哥德式恐怖動作RPG遊戲《血咒之城：暗夜儀式》的碎片人米利暗。

• 挑戰島：對於久經沙場的老練君主來說，這是有史以來最大的挑戰。迎接五項規則和目標各不相同的挑戰。你能活得夠久，奪得最終的金王冠嗎？

還可透過 App 內購取得新的 DLC：

• 《Norse Lands》：在這款維京主題的擴充內容裡仰仗北歐諸神的力量、指揮彪悍的軍隊，打造維京風格的兵械，並破解謎題吧。

• 《Call of Olympus》：進入以古希臘為背景的大型擴充內容，探索古老傳說中的島嶼，尋求眾神恩典，抵禦陣容空前的貪婪生物大軍。

你的冒險才剛剛開始。君主啊，請保持警戒，因為黑夜就要來臨，保護好你的王冠！

tw.trackCensoredName: 電影精靈 - 專業視頻編輯和電影製作
tw.releaseNotes: 修复在iPhone X/12/13下，曲线变速页面显示不正常的问题。
tw.description:
您想製作屬於自己的微電影嗎？
您想當導演、製片、主演……嗎？

在電影精靈中，這些角色可以全部由您一個人搞定！

通過電影精靈，您可以把各種媒體素材如視頻、照片、音樂、文字、錄音以及手指塗鴉等，按照您的創意，把它們編輯組合在一起，並給它們添加各種特效（場景切換特效、文字動畫、濾鏡特效、片頭、蒙版等），創作出屬於您自己的微電影。

主要功能：

-可裁剪、分割、合併、縮放各種媒體素材
-疊加多層視頻（畫中畫效果），視頻數量沒有限制
-添加各種蒙版（線性蒙版、矩形蒙版、圓形蒙版、文字蒙版和路徑蒙版）來隱藏或者顯示影片的各個部分
-可摳圖（鋼筆工具、套索工具、塗抹工具和文字工具等自定義形狀摳圖工具）
-快進、倒播視頻，給視頻添加慢動作鏡頭（1/12慢速至16倍速）
- 360度旋轉影片
-多種混合影像模式
-各種字體、文字模版、文字顏色、表情符號、陰影、文字描邊等
-內寘多種風格的免費配樂和音效，可添加電腦上的音樂或者iTunes裏的音樂，還可選取匯出視頻裏的音訊
-給視頻配音錄音
-直接在影片上用手指繪畫塗鴉
-專業視頻比例，可縮放的時間線，無限制的軌道圖層
-簡單自動跟蹤功能
-添加移動式馬賽克
-自定義影片背景顏色
-可調整素材亮度、對比度、飽和度
-創建自己的Gif動畫
-私人定制特效片頭（需另外購買）
-多達幾十種濾鏡特效（素描、漫畫、魚眼、放大鏡、顏色濾鏡等）
-多達幾十種場景切換特效
-可給視頻／照片設定各種外觀如圓形、心形和鑽石等，甚至自定義獨一無二的形狀
-可設定疊加視頻／照片的透明色（Chroma Key），比如去除照片中純色背景色（綠幕藍幕摳像）
-能把視頻／照片變黑白，把需要突出的部分還原色彩突出出來（Color Splash）
-能自由變形視頻／照片成不規則形狀
-給視頻／照片／文字添加運動點，使它們動起來，縮放、旋轉和移動結合起來可創建出各種各樣的絢麗效果
-實时預覽，高分辨視頻輸出
-可通過Wi-Fi直接從電腦導入多媒體素材：視頻、照片、音樂和Gif動畫等
-可直接保存並分享影片到社交網絡，如雲盤、微信、QQ、抖音等

如果您有任何問題或迴響，請直接發郵件到verytools2006@gmail.com，我們會儘快答覆您。謝謝！
tw.trackName: 電影精靈 - 專業視頻編輯和電影製作

tw.description:
建造亮麗的江戶之城。
配置城堡和小巷，建立出大氣的城下町吧！

增加代表商店和居民經濟價值的『俸祿』，爭取成為日本第一的大名吧。

發展的秘訣在於將契合度好的建築物建在一起，例如『蕎麥麵店＋天婦羅店』、『地藏菩薩＋帽傘店』等。

建造客棧後，歷史上的名人也許會在『各國漫遊之旅』、『驅鬼之旅』、『寺子屋修學旅行』中前來參觀。

開闢江戶未來的也許就是正在瀏覽介紹的你！！
----
其它遊戲請透過關鍵字「Kairosoft」來進行搜索。https://kairopark.jp
還有支援移動設備/電腦的遊戲發展國物語等免費遊戲哦。

tw.trackCensoredName: 石器狩獵勇士:原始人部落之戰
tw.trackName: 石器狩獵勇士:原始人部落之戰
tw.description:
在這片古老而神秘的原始土地上，你扮演一位勇敢的原始戰士，肩負著保衛部落的重任。城牆之外，兇猛的恐龍和野獸隨時準備攻擊你。拿起你的武器，準備迎接一場驚心動魄的戰鬥吧！
遊戲玩法
遊戲操作簡單，所有玩家都能輕鬆上手。透過在螢幕上左右滑動，你可以控制你的原始戰士在城牆上移動，躲避野獸的攻擊。點擊螢幕，他的武器可以越過城牆射擊，攻擊逼近的敵人。每一次精準的射擊都可能改變戰局，所以要保持警惕，靈活機動，確保每一次攻擊都命中目標。
武器系統
在戰鬥中，擊敗野獸不僅可以降低威脅，還能讓你有機會收集它們掉落的武器。這些武器種類繁多，有些可以增加傷害，有些可以擴大射程，有些甚至帶有冰凍或燃燒等特殊效果。巧妙地使用這些武器，將讓你在戰鬥中佔上風。 Boss 戰與強力武器
成功擊敗一波又一波的野獸後，強大的 Boss 便會出現。這些 Boss 體型巨大，攻擊力驚人，擊敗它們後您將獲得強力武器作為獎勵。這些武器不僅威力強大，還可能擁有獨特的技能，使後續戰鬥更有效率。

生命值恢復與怪物屠殺

在戰鬥中，擊殺一定數量的怪物後，您的生命值將自動恢復。這意味著即使您在激烈的戰鬥中受到傷害，只要您堅持不懈，就能恢復並繼續保衛您的部落。

坐騎與恐龍夥伴

隨著遊戲的進行，您將解鎖坐騎和恐龍夥伴。坐騎可以提高您的移動速度，讓您更靈活地躲避攻擊。恐龍夥伴與您並肩作戰，擁有強大的攻擊力和特殊技能，讓您更輕鬆地擊敗敵人。

這是一款輕鬆的迷你遊戲，非常適合在閒暇時享受。無論你是通勤，還是短暫休息，都能快速沉浸在戰鬥的樂趣中。拿起你的武器，加入保衛原始部落的戰鬥，成為部落的英雄！

advisories: 轉蛋
偶而/輕微的卡通或幻想暴力
tw.releaseNotes: - The HP increase buff has been removed from PvP and Guild Battles.
tw.description:
召集傳說英雄，挑戰無盡關卡！
自動戰鬥、採礦、強化通通都有！
真正的放置型奇幻 RPG，即使離線也能持續成長！

* 組建擁有獨特技能的英雄戰隊，發揮戰略優勢！

* 利用礦坑系統收集資源！打造裝備所需的一切盡在其中！

* 挑戰強大的首領，獲得傳說級獎勵！

* 自動成長系統，讓忙碌的你也能輕鬆遊玩！

* 多樣化內容：地城、遺物、進化、傳說裝備等你來體驗！

立即下載，開始書寫屬於你的傳奇！
馬上開始遊戲，收集你的英雄吧！

us.releaseNotes:
Corrections to Korean and Chinese Translations.
Updates to SmartEye smart eyepiece control.
Stability and usability updates.
us.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

This app has a simple functionality: detecting the presence of spirits and capturing them. 
Once captured, it displays the Six Syllable Mantra from Eastern Buddhism as a form of protection and blessing for the user.

• This application might scare you.
• All sensors are on one page.
• A real radar to track anomalies.
• Highly accurate EMF (Electromagnetic Field) detector.
• Take photos and detect anomalies within - can be freely turned on or off.
• More detailed instructions are available in the app; simply touch the ? button to access them.

Warning:
If you are a very sensitive or easily scared individual, please consider not using this app and turning it off. Do not put yourself in danger while using this app. If you believe you are in danger, please close the app, contact someone for help, and leave the area immediately.

Disclaimer:

us.description:
You wake up, alone, on a strange island full of puzzles that will challenge and surprise you.

You don't remember who you are, and you don't remember how you got here, but there's one thing you can do: explore the island in hope of discovering clues, regaining your memory, and somehow finding your way home.

The Witness is a single-player game in an open world with dozens of locations to explore and over 500 puzzles. This game respects you as an intelligent player and it treats your time as precious. There's no filler; each of those puzzles brings its own new idea into the mix. So, this is a game full of ideas.

us.description:
A shroud of mystery envelops these uncharted medieval lands where ancient monuments, relics and mythical creatures await. Echoes of bygone eras speak of past greatness and in Kingdom Two Crowns, part of the award-winning franchise Kingdom, you embark on an adventure as the Monarch. In this side-scrolling journey atop your steed, you recruit loyal subjects, build your Kingdom and protect your crown from the Greed, monstrous creatures looking to steal your Kingdom's treasures. 

BUILD
Lay the foundation of a mighty Kingdom with towering walls, protecting towers while cultivating prosperity through building farms and recruiting villagers. In Kingdom Two Crowns expanding and growing your Kingdom grants access to new units and technologies.  

EXPLORE
Venture into the unknown beyond the protection of your borders, through secluded forests and ancient ruins to seek treasures and hidden knowledge to aid your quest. Who knows what legendary artifacts or mythological beings you will find. 

DEFEND
As the night falls, shadows come to life and the monstrous Greed assault your kingdom. Rally your troops, muster your courage, and steel yourself, for each night will demand ever-growing feats of tactical mastermind. Deploy archers, knights, siege weapons, and even newfound Monarch abilities and artifacts to hold against the waves of Greed. 

CONQUER
As the Monarch, lead assaults against the source of the Greed to secure your islands. Send your groups of soldiers to clash with the enemy. A word of caution: make sure your troops are prepared and sufficient in numbers, as the Greed will not go down without a fight.  

UNCHARTED ISLES
Kingdom Two Crowns is an evolving experience that includes several free content updates:

• Shogun: Journey to lands inspired by the architecture and culture of feudal Japan. Play as the mighty Shogun or Onna-bugeisha, enlist the ninja, lead your soldiers to battle atop the mythological Kirin, and form new strategies as you brave the Greed hiding in thick bamboo forests. 

• Dead Lands: Enter the dark lands of Kingdom. Play as unique Monarchs, including the Shardbinder Miriam, with powerful traits from the gothic horror action-RPG Bloodstained. 

• Challenge Islands: Representing the greatest challenge ever seen for hardened veteran monarchs.  Take on five challenges with different rules and objectives. Can you survive long enough to claim the gold crown?  

Additional DLC available via in-app purchase:

• Norse Lands: Set in a domain inspired by Norse Viking culture 1000 C.E, the Norse Lands DLC is a full new campaign that expands the world of Kingdom Two Crowns with a unique setting to build, defend, explore, and conquer.

• Call of Olympus: Explore islands of ancient legends and mythos, seek the favors of the gods to challenge and defend against Greed of epic scales in this major expansion. 

Your adventure is only the beginning. Oh Monarch, stay vigilant for dark nights are still to come, protect your crown!

Pay once, use forever！ You are free to use and upgrade the App in your whole life once you pay for the download once.

Do you want to share your exciting and memorable moments with someone?
Do you want to make your own movie?
Do you want to be a director, a producer, a starring actor?

In MovieSpirit, these characters can all be done by you alone!

With MovieSpirit, you can combine various media materials, such as videos, photos, music, text, recording and finger graffiti, and according to your creativity,  edit them together and add various special effects (scene switching effects, Text animation, Filter effects, video Intro, masks and so on) to create your own movie. 

Main functions:

- Crop, split, merge, cut, transform, flip and scale media clips
- Overlay multi-layers video (Picture-in-picture effect),  no limit to the number of videos or pictures
- Professional Video Ratio, Scalable Timeline (frame by frame), Unlimited Track Layers
- Add masks (Line mask, Rectangle mask, Circle mask, Text mask and Path mask options) to hide or show parts of the video
- Video matting, remove video background
- Cutout Tool (Custom Shape Tools such as Pen Tool, Lasso Tool, Smudge Tool and Text Tool can be used for image matting)
- Replace background for green/blue screen video, chroma key compositing
- up to 50 special effects options, such as Blur, Snow, Rain, Bubble, Flower, Earthquake, Mirror, Fireworks, Smoke, Vortex, flame, Starry Sky and so on
- Gradual Opaque
- Fast-Forward, Slow-Motion and reverse video (1/12 Slow to 16-fold Speed)
- Text-to-Voice function (dozens of language options)
- 360 Degrees rotating video
- Multiple Image Blending modes
- Various fonts, text templates, text colors, vertical text, emojis, shadows, text strokes, alignment etc., supports downloading new fonts from Internet or icloud

- Voice recording

- Simple automatic tracking function
- Add movable mosaic
- Custom Background Color, such as solid color, gradient color and extract color from picture
- Dozens of Animation effects
- Adjustable Brightness, Contrast, Saturation, Exposure, White Balance, Gamma
- Create your own GIF animation
- Private Custom Intro titles (sold separately)
- Up to 80 filter effects (sketch, comics, fisheye, magnifiers, glass, background blur, rotation blur, vortex, various color filter and so on
- Up to 60 scene switching effects
- dozens of appearance shapes can be set for video/picture such as circle, heart, diamond, star, various irregular shapes and even customize unique shapes
- Can turn the video/photo into black and white, highlight the part that needs to be highlighted (Color Splash)
- Free to deform video/photo into irregular shapes
- Add motion points to video/photo/text to make them move, zoom, rotate and move together to create a variety of gorgeous effects, such as fade-in and fade-out effect and up to 100 multiple phantom effect
- Real-time preview, high resolution video output (HD)
- Import multimedia material directly from your computer via Wi-Fi: videos, photos, music and GIF animations
- Save and share videos directly to social networks such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, iCloud, WeChat, Mailbox and so on
- Helpful video tutorials


We're looking forward to any feedback and comments on MovieSpirit, and if you have any query or problem, please feel free to contact us via email verytools2006@gmail.com

We are committed to your long-term satisfaction. Thanks!

us.description:
Our app connects to YouTube in real-time and lets you play any video with exclusive features designed just for you!
Highlight Features:
• Locked screen playback: Keep listening to your videos’ audio in the background.
• Floating playback (PIP): Use other apps while watching your videos.
• Sleep timer: Set an automatic shutdown and relax worry-free.
• Loop mode: Play your favorite video on infinite repeat.
It also includes:
• Toggleable subtitles
• Playback speed control
• Quality selection and fullscreen mode
• Smart search with real-time suggestions (predictive search)
• Upload date filters: Day, week, month, or year
FyTube is perfect for those who don’t want to miss a single video about their favorite topics.
Explore, play, and enjoy your favorite content to the fullest — interruption-free!

SPECIAL FEATURES
FLOATING PLAYBACK
Never stop watching! With this feature, you can keep watching your videos while using other apps .
Just enter fullscreen mode and tap the PIP button — it’s the second icon at the top of the player.
Your video will float on top of your screen no matter what app you open!

LOCKED SCREEN PLAYBACK
Listen without interruptions!
Keep enjoying your video’s audio even when your screen is off. Perfect for listening to music, podcasts, or your favorite tunes while driving or relaxing.
How to activate it?
Just lock your device screen. You’ll instantly see the background player.
Tap Play — and that’s it! The audio will keep going without pauses.

SLEEP TIMER
Fall asleep peacefully — your app will stop by itself!
Enable this feature to automatically stop your videos after the time you choose. Perfect for sleeping or napping without worrying about stopping anything.
How to activate it?
Tap the timer button, choose how long you want it to run, and that’s it.
Relax and let the app handle the rest!

LOOP MODE
Play your favorite video over and over again!
Enable this feature to make the video repeat automatically as many times as you want.
How to know if it’s on?
The icon will turn red when active.
(VoiceOver compatible: it will indicate whether it’s on or off.)
Perfect for songs, meditations, or any content you love to repeat!

Need help using these features? Visit: fydub.com/fytube

BASIC FEATURES
• Fullscreen high-quality video playback
• Easy-to-use interface, friendly design
• Skip forward or rewind anytime — never miss the best parts
• Subtitle activation
• Adjust playback speed to your preference
• Change video quality
• Smart search with real-time suggestions and upload date filters: day, week, month, year, all
• Each video includes a related videos section to discover more interesting content
• Discover the latest videos and stay up to date with the news
• Our app connects directly to YouTube, letting you find any video
• Enjoy content on any AirPlay-compatible device
• VoiceOver compatible (enhanced descriptions)
• No account required
• We don’t store cache, cookies, or personal data without your permission — watch safely
• Interface available in 29 languages
• NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS
Get FyTube with a one-time payment and start a new streaming experience — ad-free and subscription-free.

Minimum Requirements:
• iOS 13 or later
• 3G connection or higher

Privacy Policy:
https://fydub.com/privacy-policy_fytube
Terms of Service:
https://fydub.com/terms-of-service_fytube

youtube, youtube music, youtube vanced, ad blocker for YouTube, no subscription, skip ads on YouTube, music without ads, ad-free, YouTube app, adblocker for YouTube, block pop-ups, remove ads, block ads, adblock, content blocker, no ads, ad-free browser, block advertising, skip ads, ad-free music, YouTube without ads, videos without ads, etc.

Have questions about how to use FyTube?
Visit fydub.com/fytube or write to us — we’ll be happy to help. We reply to all emails: fytube@fydub.com

Strategically place compatible buildings to make "combos," boosting your Yield to become the best castle town in all the land!

Supports iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad. 
Note: Screen rotation and zoom are only available on iPhone 3GS and later, iPod touch 2nd generation and later, and iPad. 

The game now lets you switch between English and Japanese.

Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!

tr.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

tr.description:
Play MONOPOLY on the go without distractions – no ads, no fuss! 

Challenge friends, family and fans from around the globe in the digital version of the official MONOPOLY board game, licensed by Hasbro. 

Head online to play your favourite board game with anyone, anywhere, at any time, or compete against state-of-the-art AI opponents offline. Plus, with the seamless PASS & PLAY mode, you can play the classic MONOPOLY board game with your friends with just one device! 

The classic MONOPOLY board game takes a bold leap into a new format, arriving on mobile with amazing graphics, smooth animations and a catchy soundtrack! 


HOW TO PLAY MONOPOLY

1. Download the official MONOPOLY app
2. Press “PLAY”
3. Pick a mode, board, dice and token
4. Roll the dice and move around the board
5. If you land on a property tile, you can buy it
6. Collect rent when other players land on it
7. Continue around the board, drawing cards when instructed – will you be hit with a surprise tax? Sent to jail? Or get a little bonus money? 
8. If you run out of money, you’ll be bankrupt and out of the game
9. The last player left with a profit wins! 

FEATURES

- MONOPOLY ON THE GO – No connection? No problem. Our roster of AI opponents are ready to challenge you! Or play with your friends offline with Pass & Play! 
- MULTIPLE MODES – Take on AI opponents in Single Player or compete against friends and family in Pass & Play or Online With Friends. Try out Online Multiplayer and face off against fellow tycoons from around the world! 
- EXCLUSIVE BOARDS – Experience the iconic board game like never before with exclusive boards and more! 
- AWESOME NEW TOKENS AND DICE – Whatever your style, MONOPOLY has a set of dice fit for a future tycoon! Pick from nostalgic classic tokens or brand-new designs exclusive to the mobile game.

Get the most authentic MONOPOLY experience with the official MONOPOLY mobile game!

The MONOPOLY name and logo, the distinctive design of the gameboard, the four corner squares, the MR. MONOPOLY name and character, as well as each of the distinctive elements of the board and playing pieces are trademarks of Hasbro for its property trading game and game equipment. © 1935, 2025 Hasbro. All Rights Reserved.

tr.description:
Our app connects to YouTube in real-time and lets you play any video with exclusive features designed just for you!
Highlight Features:
• Locked screen playback: Keep listening to your videos’ audio in the background.
• Floating playback (PIP): Use other apps while watching your videos.
• Sleep timer: Set an automatic shutdown and relax worry-free.
• Loop mode: Play your favorite video on infinite repeat.
It also includes:
• Toggleable subtitles
• Playback speed control
• Quality selection and fullscreen mode
• Smart search with real-time suggestions (predictive search)
• Upload date filters: Day, week, month, or year
FyTube is perfect for those who don’t want to miss a single video about their favorite topics.
Explore, play, and enjoy your favorite content to the fullest — interruption-free!

SPECIAL FEATURES
FLOATING PLAYBACK
Never stop watching! With this feature, you can keep watching your videos while using other apps .
Just enter fullscreen mode and tap the PIP button — it’s the second icon at the top of the player.
Your video will float on top of your screen no matter what app you open!

LOCKED SCREEN PLAYBACK
Listen without interruptions!
Keep enjoying your video’s audio even when your screen is off. Perfect for listening to music, podcasts, or your favorite tunes while driving or relaxing.
How to activate it?
Just lock your device screen. You’ll instantly see the background player.
Tap Play — and that’s it! The audio will keep going without pauses.

SLEEP TIMER
Fall asleep peacefully — your app will stop by itself!
Enable this feature to automatically stop your videos after the time you choose. Perfect for sleeping or napping without worrying about stopping anything.
How to activate it?
Tap the timer button, choose how long you want it to run, and that’s it.
Relax and let the app handle the rest!

LOOP MODE
Play your favorite video over and over again!
Enable this feature to make the video repeat automatically as many times as you want.
How to know if it’s on?
The icon will turn red when active.
(VoiceOver compatible: it will indicate whether it’s on or off.)
Perfect for songs, meditations, or any content you love to repeat!
Need help using these features? Visit: fydub.com/fytube

BASIC FEATURES
• Fullscreen high-quality video playback
• Easy-to-use interface, friendly design
• Skip forward or rewind anytime — never miss the best parts
• Subtitle activation
• Adjust playback speed to your preference
• Change video quality
• Smart search with real-time suggestions and upload date filters: day, week, month, year, all
• Each video includes a related videos section to discover more interesting content
• Discover the latest videos and stay up to date with the news
• Our app connects directly to YouTube, letting you find any video
• Enjoy content on any AirPlay-compatible device
• VoiceOver compatible (enhanced descriptions)
• No account required
• We don’t store cache, cookies, or personal data without your permission — watch safely
• Interface available in 29 languages
• NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS
Get FyTube with a one-time payment and start a new streaming experience — ad-free and subscription-free.

• iOS 13 or later
• 3G connection or higher
